name: Counter-Infiltration & Information Warfare
description: Training in detecting, exposing, and neutralizing infiltration tactics and information warfare strategies used by hostile entities.

cards.title: Identifying Infiltration Tactics
cards.description: Understanding how infiltration occurs within organizations, movements, and online communities.
bulletpoints: Recognizing behavioral patterns of infiltrators.
Analyzing disinformation seeding strategies.
Spotting coordinated subversion campaigns.

cards.title: Covert Influence Detection
cards.description: Detecting and neutralizing covert influence operations designed to manipulate perception and control narratives.
bulletpoints: Identifying social engineering and psyop techniques.
Tracing connections between operatives and handlers.
Understanding how controlled opposition is created and managed.

cards.title: Counteracting Agent Provocateurs
cards.description: Dealing with disruptive elements who provoke division, violence, or misdirection.
bulletpoints: Recognizing the tactics used by agent provocateurs.
Strategies to de-escalate and isolate disruptors.
Using psychological profiling to unmask operatives.

cards.title: Defensive Counterintelligence
cards.description: Applying defensive CI measures to protect sensitive operations from infiltration.
bulletpoints: Developing internal vetting and security protocols.
Compartmentalization strategies to limit exposure.
Behavioral analysis for detecting double agents.

cards.title: Disinformation Network Disruption
cards.description: Neutralizing hostile information networks and influence campaigns.
bulletpoints: Tracking disinformation sources and their funding.
Deploying counter-narrative strategies.
Engaging in digital counter-propaganda warfare.

cards.title: Decentralized Resistance Tactics
cards.description: Developing decentralized and resilient communication networks.
bulletpoints: Using cryptographic methods to protect sensitive information.
Leveraging decentralized web technologies for secure operations.
Implementing peer-to-peer intelligence-sharing methods.

cards.title: Strategic Misdirection and Deception
cards.description: Using counter-deception techniques to mislead hostile infiltrators.
bulletpoints: Deploying honeypots and bait operations.
Creating controlled leaks to identify internal threats.
Understanding counter-psyops strategies.

cards.title: Psychological Warfare Resilience
cards.description: Strengthening mental resilience against manipulation and psyops.
bulletpoints: Identifying common psychological warfare techniques.
Developing critical thinking skills to resist gaslighting.
Creating mental defense strategies against mass influence tactics.

cards.title: Identifying Media PsyOps
cards.description: Recognizing and countering media-based psychological operations.
bulletpoints: Spotting narrative control mechanisms in mainstream media.
Understanding how mass perception is shaped through propaganda.
Using OSINT to uncover media collusion with intelligence networks.

cards.title: Advanced Situational Awareness for Information Warfare
cards.description: Developing real-time situational awareness to anticipate and counter infiltration and disinformation campaigns.
bulletpoints: Analyzing geopolitical trends influencing information warfare.
Tracking real-time influence campaigns.
Developing rapid response strategies to mitigate disinformation attacks.
